birth_place.zh-cn: 山西省归化城土默特塔布村

description.zh-cn: 蒙古族，中国共产党和中华人民共和国的高级领导人，有“蒙古王”之称。中国人民解放军开国上将，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、全国人大常委会副委员长、国务院副总理、中共中央统战部部长等职。是中华人民共和国历史上官阶最高的少数民族人士。
description.en: An ethnic Mongol, a senior leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, known as the 'Mongol King'. He was an opening general of the People's Liberation Army and served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国副主席

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国副主席
en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家副元首。
description.en: The deputy head of state of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: One of the major leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人之一，接替乌兰夫担任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: One of the leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who succeeded Ulanhu as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中共中央统一战线工作部

zh-cn: 中共中央统一战线工作部
en: United Front Work Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: A functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中共中央主席。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中共中央主席、中共中央总书记。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫长子，曾任全国人大常委会副委员长。
description.en: Eldest son of Ulanhu, former Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的第一任妻子。
description.en: Ulanhu's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的第二任妻子。
description.en: Ulanhu's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义青年团的前身。
description.en: The predecessor of the Communist Youth League of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

en: Mongolian and Tibetan School in Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产主义运动的先驱、中国共产党主要创始人之一。
description.en: A pioneer of the Chinese communist movement and one of the main founders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人、工人运动领袖。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and a leader of the labor movement.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二代中央领导核心，中华人民共和国最高领导人。
description.en: The core of the second generation of central leadership of the Communist Party of China and the paramount leader of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国第6、7任总统，蒋介石之子。
description.en: The 6th and 7th President of the Republic of China, son of Chiang Kai-shek.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古地方武装反对日本侵略和国民党政府的武装暴动。
description.en: An armed uprising by local Mongolian armed forces against Japanese aggression and the Kuomintang government.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发动和领导的，于1966年至1976年间发生在中国大陆的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement in mainland China from 1966 to 1976, initiated and led by Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间在内蒙古自治区发生的大规模冤假错案。
description.en: A large-scale case of wrongful convictions that occurred in the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中国人民解放军和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Liberation Army, and the People's Republic of China.

en: Politburo of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的领导机构。
description.en: The leading body of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的社会活动家、对外工作领导人。在被提名为国家副主席候选人后突然逝世。
description.en: A social activist and leader in foreign affairs of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China. Died suddenly after being nominated as a candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 一种急性、严重的心脏状态。
description.en: An acute, severe heart condition.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导下成立的第一个省级少数民族自治政府。
description.en: The first provincial-level minority autonomous government established under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府。
description.en: The Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China.

en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会。
description.en: National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 内蒙古人民共和国临时政府主席。
description.en: Chairman of the Provisional Government of the Inner Mongolian People's Republic.

nodes.id: 内蒙古人民共和国临时政府

zh-cn: 内蒙古人民共和国临时政府

description.zh-cn: 于1945年成立的短暂政权，后被乌兰夫解散。
description.en: A short-lived regime established in 1945, later dissolved by Ulanhu.

nodes.id: 内蒙古自治运动联合会

zh-cn: 内蒙古自治运动联合会

description.zh-cn: 由乌兰夫组织成立的推动内蒙古自治的组织。
description.en: An organization established by Ulanhu to promote the autonomy of Inner Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫的孙女，布赫之女，曾任内蒙古自治区政府主席。
description.en: Ulanhu's granddaughter, Buhe's daughter, former Chairwoman of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region Government.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国副主席

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫在第六届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上当选为中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Ulanhu was elected Vice President of the People's Republic of China at the First Session of the Sixth National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫担任国家副主席期间，国家主席是李先念。
description.en: When Ulanhu served as Vice President, the President was Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 王震接替乌兰夫出任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: Wang Zhen succeeded Ulanhu as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫任统战部长期间，华国锋担任中共中央主席。
description.en: While Ulanhu was Minister of the United Front Work Department, Hua Guofeng served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫任统战部长期间，胡耀邦担任中共中央主席。
description.en: While Ulanhu was Minister of the United Front Work Department, Hu Yaobang served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 布赫是乌兰夫的长子。
description.en: Buhe is the eldest son of Ulanhu.

description.zh-cn: 布赫是乌兰夫与第一任妻子云亭所生。
description.en: Buhe is the son of Ulanhu and his first wife, Yun Ting.

description.zh-cn: 1923年，乌兰夫进入北平蒙藏学校学习。
description.en: In 1923, Ulanhu entered the Mongolian and Tibetan School in Beiping to study.

description.zh-cn: 1925年9月，被派赴莫斯科中山大学学习。
description.en: In September 1925, he was sent to study at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

description.zh-cn: 在北京蒙藏学校学习期间，在李大钊、赵世炎、邓中夏等共产党人的帮助下，乌兰夫参加了马克思主义研究小组。
description.en: During his studies at the Mongolian and Tibetan School in Beijing, with the help of communists like Li Dazhao, Zhao Shiyan, and Deng Zhongxia, Ulanhu joined a Marxism study group.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫与邓小平、蒋经国等人是莫斯科中山大学的同学。
description.en: Ulanhu was a classmate of Deng Xiaoping, Chiang Ching-kuo and others at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫与蒋经国在莫斯科中山大学是同桌同学。
description.en: Ulanhu and Chiang Ching-kuo were deskmates at Moscow Sun Yat-sen University.

description.zh-cn: 1931年10月，乌兰夫受王若飞指派，在西蒙从事群众、党务、军运和情报工作。
description.en: In October 1931, Ulanhu was dispatched by Wang Ruofei to engage in mass, party, military, and intelligence work in Western Mongolia.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫策划了1936年2月的“百灵庙暴动”。
description.en: Ulanhu planned the 'Bailingmiao Uprising' in February 1936.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫领导组建内蒙古自治政府，并被选为主席。
description.en: Ulanhu led the formation of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Government and was elected its chairman.

relationships.target: 内蒙古自治运动联合会

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫组织成立了内蒙古自治运动联合会，并出任主席。
description.en: Ulanhu organized the establishment of the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Movement Federation and served as its chairman.

relationships.target: 内蒙古人民共和国临时政府

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫成功解散了以补英达赖为首的内蒙古人民共和国临时政府。
description.en: Ulanhu successfully dissolved the Provisional Government of the Inner Mongolian People's Republic led by Buyandalai.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫成功解散了以补英达赖为首的内蒙古人民共和国临时政府。
description.en: Ulanhu successfully dissolved the Provisional Government of the Inner Mongolian People's Republic led by Buyandalai.

description.zh-cn: “文化大革命”开始后，乌兰夫因“内人党”问题被批斗，并被撤销党政军领导职务软禁于北京。
description.en: After the start of the 'Cultural Revolution', Ulanhu was persecuted over the 'Inner Mongolian People's Party' issue, removed from his party, government, and military leadership positions, and placed under house arrest in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫在文革中因“内人党”问题被批斗和撤职。
description.en: Ulanhu was persecuted and removed from office during the Cultural Revolution due to the 'Inner Mongolian People's Party' incident.

description.zh-cn: 乌兰夫在文革期间受到国务院总理周恩来的保护。
description.en: Ulanhu was protected by Premier Zhou Enlai during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 根据中共中央主席毛泽东的意见，乌兰夫等13位老干部被宣布解放。
description.en: According to the opinion of CPC Chairman Mao Zedong, Ulanhu and 12 other veteran cadres were declared liberated.

description.zh-cn: 1983年6月10日，国家副主席候选人廖承志因突发心脏病逝世。
description.en: On June 10, 1983, Liao Chengzhi, a candidate for Vice President, died of a sudden heart attack.

description.zh-cn: 在廖承志逝世后，中共中央政治局召开扩大会议，决定由乌兰夫替补为国家副主席候选人。
description.en: After the death of Liao Chengzhi, the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee held an enlarged meeting and decided that Ulanhu would be the replacement candidate for Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 布小林是布赫之女。
description.en: Bu Xiaolin is the daughter of Buhe.
